meanings.definition: Occurring at irregular intervals; scattered or isolated.
meanings.sent1: The sporadic rain showers left the ground wet in some areas but dry in others.
meanings.sent2: Her sporadic attendance at the meetings made it difficult to rely on her.
meanings.sent3: The sporadic appearance of the cat always brought a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: His sporadic bursts of laughter echoed through the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The sporadic flicker of the dying candle cast eerie shadows on the wall.

meanings.sent1: We enjoyed sporadic visits from our distant relatives throughout the year.
meanings.sent2: The sporadic chirping of the birds signaled the arrival of spring.
meanings.sent3: The sporadic delivery of the mail always kept us guessing.
meanings.sent4: Her sporadic acts of kindness touched the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The sporadic applause from the audience filled the theater with anticipation.
